analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sa ni dassana ttika sa ārammaṇa duka

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasārammaṇo
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham sa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na sa ārammaṇaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham sa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na sa ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe anidassana appaṭigham sa ārammaṇam dhamma

original: paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasārammaṇo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nasārammaṇo
analyzed: paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na sa ārammaṇaḥ ca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na sa ārammaṇaḥ

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe aññamaññe

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naanārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham anārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na anārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
